attributes.action: bring in driving assesments every 10 yrs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Due to the poor standards in UK driving i would like to see drivers being made to have a driving assesment every 10yrs & bring everyone up to date with ever changing rules and reg's.. also i would like to see a ban on under 21's having passengers after 7pm as they do in australia. DOING BOTH of the above would not only SAVE LIVE'S but would also free up emerg serv's, etc etc the list is endless..

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
False or incomplete name or address information
